description:
Indranil Ghosh nos presenta "An introduction to hands-on football data analysis in Python".

Resumen:
Many people want to start with football data analysis and this talk (accompanied by jupyter notebooks maintaining a pedagogic flow of Python codes) introduces these concepts hands-on (accessing data, visualization, and analysis) to those interested.

 ---
La novena edición de la PyConES se celebra como un evento en línea y totalmente gratuito durante los días 2 y 3 de Octubre de 2021.
Web: https://2021.es.pycon.org
Agenda: https://2021.es.pycon.org/#schedule
title: An introduction to hands-on football data analysis in Python - PyConES 2021
